description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(899).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,60,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (29 +30*x +29*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -60*x^2 +x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013a(n) = 60*a(n-2) - a(n-4), - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[899], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 16 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[(29 + 30 x + 29 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 60 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[29, 30, 1769, 1799]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 60*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
